name: Who Took My Wheels
description:
Controls
  • AD or Arrows keys to move left and right
  • You get progressively slower (Duh!) so try to touch dynamites or use ramps to get a speed boost
  • Try to beat the next player in the rank!
Assets:

All of the assets made by me. (Except for the awesome music which has attribution licence). Made for #Atomjam in 24 hours

Leaderboard database hosted by a free service Dreamlo

Music attribution:

Game Mode by WinnieTheMoog
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6343-game-mode
